dublin_core.dcvalue: This article provides an overview of telemedicine and other eHealth activities in Iceland Several telemedicine projects which have been running since 1996 are described The projects include teleradiology teleobstetrics telepsychiatry maritime telemedicine telemedicine in surgery telepathology and a project for the use of telemedicine in various consultations The role of the Icelandic Health net for telemedicine including projects for teleobstetrics and telemedicine for emergency medicine is described with the projects included A few other eHealth activities including electronic patient record and information systems are also described
Review on the state of telemedicine and eHealth in Iceland.
